verses.translation: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree
And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree

verses.text: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ
verses.translation: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months

verses.text: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ
verses.translation: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter
Peace it is until the emergence of dawn
